content_parts.title: APIs
Features
Optimization matrices for Finite scheduler (Read)

content_parts.content:
• Optimization: used to read Optimization code data for Finite scheduler
  • Optimization line: used to read Optimization line data for Finite scheduler

content_parts.title: Setup time exception lines for Finite scheduler (Read)

content_parts.content: Setup time exceptions: used to read Setup time exception lines for Finite scheduler

content_parts.title: Attribute values for Finite scheduler (Read)

content_parts.content: Attribute line: used to read Attribute line data for Finite scheduler

content_parts.title: Attribute for Finite scheduler (Read)

content_parts.content: Attribute: used to read Attribute code data for Finite scheduler

content_parts.title: Setup matrix for Finite scheduler (Read)

content_parts.content: Setup time: used to read Setup time data for Finite scheduler

content_parts.title: Automated Testing
Improvements
To take screenshots on demand

content_parts.content:
Sage X3 Automated Test Platform version 2.8.0 delivers a new step definition to take screenshot on demand. 

  • prior to version 2.8.0 screenshots were only taken when the tests fail.
  • with version 2.8.0, it is also possible to take screenshots on demand.

content_parts.title: Distribution
Bug Fixes
POR (LEG): GESSDH - Picking of unsigned orders

content_parts.content: The message will be displayed once.

content_parts.title: The Product Site Creation (function CREITFMA) option does not correctly process the filter indicated in the function when selecting only one category and all items
Sales Budgets (GESSQH) - Line limit achieved

content_parts.content: In sales quote GESSQH, check the mximum line number for line insertion

content_parts.title: Amount in the Inquiry List of receipts (CONSCPR)

content_parts.content: After deleting a receipt line with 'change receipts' action, the list of receipts inquiry (CONSCPR) displays correctly the updated amount.

content_parts.title: Amount type does not pull correctly from supplier category

content_parts.content: When creating a new supplier using the right-list Supplier menu from Business Partner function (GESBPR), the amount type is initiallized by the supplier category.

content_parts.title: Importing subcontracting order receipt detail lines is not possible

content_parts.content: If import a subcontracting order receipt is done with PTHWO import model, then stock journal information (STOJOU) are included.

content_parts.title: Line 59 in SUBSTQ: Error in X3\SUBSTQ, Label AB9_NBLIG Not Found

content_parts.content: Delete the call to a non-implemented label

content_parts.title: Stock - logistic - Size of ITM data types

content_parts.content: Modify the length of the ITM data type using GLONITM.

content_parts.title: Intrastat declaration: erroneous transaction nature in the exported file thru the FREECEXP eport.

content_parts.content: The nature of transaction is now calculated in the IMPDEB script.

content_parts.title: GESITM - It is possible (wrongly) to enter a product code when it should be done by the sequence number

content_parts.content: Prevent entry of the product code when the product category is associated with a sequence number.

content_parts.title: Expected Arrival date in Transport recalculated

content_parts.content: Details of branch X3-276455-Expected-Arrival-date-in-Transport-recalculated

content_parts.title: Incorrect calculation of the tax-inclusive amount of the lines in the consultation of the customer order lines

content_parts.content: In Sales Order lines inquiry (CONSCSP), the amount including tax is displayed correctly even if no company is selected in the filter criteria.

content_parts.title: Buyer plan : same purchase request can generate several orders

content_parts.content: Two different users can not take into account the same requirement to generate the purchase order.

content_parts.title: Since 2022R1 Error message:”The source delivery has already been invoiced”

content_parts.content: It is possible to create a partial customer return on an invoiced delivery.

content_parts.title: Incorrect index error when doing the electronic signature of a sales quote - POR LEG

content_parts.content: The processing of the index is now fixed. The last line considered is has the correct number, so that the capacity is not exceeded.

content_parts.title: Proforma and shipping site

content_parts.content: When generate a proforma from a Sales Order, the shipment site assigned to the proforma is fed with the shipment site of the first Sales Order line.

content_parts.title: Invoice to be issued - Amount of a delivery retuned in a later period

content_parts.content: In invoices to be issued function (FUNAUTFAE), the date of the return is taken into account regarding the invoicing of returned quantity parameter (DLVRTNCNO).

content_parts.title: Problem with the GESITF authorization while running the function Product Site creation

content_parts.content: Details of branch X3-274440-Problem-with-the-GESITF-authorization-while-running-the-function-Product-Site-creation

content_parts.title: Size of the ITM data types

content_parts.content: To enable the modification of the product reference length, the GLONITM global variable for declaration of the variable link to ITMREF in the purchase and sales scripts should be used.

content_parts.title: Auto Print on SO Entry Transaction not working

content_parts.content: The value of "Auto print" parameter of the Sales Order entry transaction is correctly taken into account when creating the Sales Order.

content_parts.title: Replace of a material in subcontract order

content_parts.content: The inactive button "Replace" has been removed from the component detail windows (ISCMW).

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): Transferred stock is not considered in the GESINVEXT function

content_parts.content: Stock in transit is now considered at the moment of the calculation. Therefore it is incluede in the exported value.

content_parts.title: Service date not automatically charged on bom kits component

content_parts.content: In the sales invoice function, for a parent product line entered with a service date fed, the service date is automatically fed for the component products lines.

content_parts.title: SDHEDICOM, create LINABL file with text (Packing slip text) who contain line breaks

content_parts.content: The packing slip text is read taking account the break lines to generate the file

content_parts.title: Sales delivery: Difference between the DLVATI and DLVINVATI fields

content_parts.content: In the Delivery inquiry (CONSCSD) the valuation including tax (field DLVINVATI) is displayed instead of the delivery amount including tax (field DLVATI).

content_parts.title: Unable to modify Technical Sheets screen in supported way

content_parts.content: The QSTTEXAXX field lengh has been changed on the QLC1 screen in order to display the entire text.

content_parts.title: Wrong behavior in the inter-company flow when we have the signature mandatory in the purchase order (POR legislation)
CONSSAR function can not use the Stock by lot menu

content_parts.content: Display the stock by lot menu in the CONSSAR function

content_parts.title: A subcontract material return on a subcontract order does not update the 'Delivered quantity' and 'Allocated quantity' fields

content_parts.content: If a subcontract material return is created, then the quantity delivered and the quantity allocated are updated taking into account the returned quantity in the subcontract order.

content_parts.title: Pick ticket GESPRH2 header and footer text do not print

content_parts.content: Now the reports BONPREPA and BONPREPAALL print the header and footer texts from the picking tickets.

content_parts.title: Finance
Features
TicketBAI changes

content_parts.content:
ZUZENDU service allows to modify information about outbound invoices.

A dedicated URL, displayed in the Management action line of the Control system monitor, is available using the TBAI Identification or the QR code to display or update manually the outbound invoices.

content_parts.title: Improvements
Mass asset split: "Error no. 90 Error in the APPLIQUE_TEMP sub-program"

content_parts.content: The mass split now allows to choose the Numbering type between increment or new number.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
POR (LEG): SAF-T extraction - tag <Country> for XU and XI clients

content_parts.content: This is a normal behavior that occurs when no address is found with a matching country with [F:BPC]CRY.

content_parts.title: Error in the UTIMIGSIIDATA process

content_parts.content: The maximum bounds in memory for this part of the process were fixed.

content_parts.title: Error activating/deactivating KIT activity code

content_parts.content: The table declaration has been declared.

content_parts.title: Error "AMTLIN Amount : Mandatory field" on Advanced Bank Statement Import with Swiss Rappen rounding

content_parts.content: Conditions for payment lines creating during bank statements validation has been enforced to avoid creation empty lines.

content_parts.title: Form 303: Descriptions and calculation of the Results section (and Additional Information)

content_parts.content: Several issues are solved: declaration type issue, name of some boxes, correction in the result and ajustment of the generated file.

content_parts.title: Form 303: Several errors in the accumulation of the boxes of the form

content_parts.content: Several issues are solved: declaration type issue, name of some boxes, correction in the result and ajustment of the generated file.

content_parts.title: Form 303: Incorrect structure of the txt file of the form to be presented to the Tax Goberment

content_parts.content: Several issues are solved: declaration type issue, name of some boxes, correction in the result and ajustment of the generated file.

content_parts.title: Form 303: Error when generating the form with Declaration Type I: To enter

content_parts.content: Several issues are solved: declaration type issue, name of some boxes, correction in the result and ajustment of the generated file.

content_parts.title: Local Menu 2109: Spanish Invoice Type with activity code CTSW (for control system, Ticketbai) instead KSP of Spanish Localization

content_parts.content: The activity code has been updated to KSP value.

content_parts.title: POL Legislation - JPK: Amendment Declaration - record already exists

content_parts.content: This was a problem customer's side, already fixed.

content_parts.title: Bank transaction import : when batched, the pre-processing script is not executed

content_parts.content: Improved reading of settings while the import is being run from batch task. Pre-processing script is executed.

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): Tag <SettlementAmount> is not correctly filled in some cases
POR (LEG): Annual VAT declaration - Error 7 : Class Non-existent [F:BAN]

content_parts.content: The table is declared at the moment of the calculation.

content_parts.title: BSI - Flow type = Standard - the bank statement is matched with a previous payment

content_parts.content: Filter for searching previous payments has been reinforced to exclude the BSI records.

content_parts.title: Change file type on BIC template, receive error: "Variable non-existent" but invoice is created

content_parts.content: Reading Site value from imported file has been changed.

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): SAF-T Accounting extraction error - tag <CustomerTaxID> for Natural persons

content_parts.content: Solved on https://jira.sage.com/browse/X3-274423. The <CustomerTaxID> tag is being filled according to the SAF-T rules.

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): SAF-T Accounting extraction error - Duplicate unique value

content_parts.content: Solved on https://jira.sage.com/browse/X3-274423. There are no duplicated customers in SAF-T extraction.

content_parts.title: When you setup a general account with the Tax Allocation (field VATIPT): "Deductible G&S" (Services), that value of "Deductible G&S" is not captured in Supplier BP invoices for the SPA legislation

content_parts.content: The propose of this type of accounts is now used for Spanish legislation.

content_parts.title: Mass asset split: "Error no. 90 Error in the APPLIQUE_TEMP sub-program"

content_parts.content: The mass split now allows to choose the Numbering type between increment or new number.

content_parts.title: Performance issue on loading a journal entry with 2000+ lines

content_parts.content: Performance enhanced in journal lines display.

content_parts.title: Report P-IMO33-18 - should display assets reevaluated in 1998 (Portuguese Decree Law 31/98) when they are not totally depreciated at date 31/12/1997: NOK for the case of date end of the depreciation is for the same year of the reevaluation (1998).

content_parts.content: Report P-IMO33-18 displays assests reevaluated in 1998.

content_parts.title: Rounding line issue in legal ledger currency for imported journals

content_parts.content: On Imported journals the rounding line on ledger currency has the right Debit/Credit sign.

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): SAF-T extraction error "PaymentPaymentRefNoCustomerIDConstraint" for customers without VAT number

content_parts.content: Solved on https://jira.sage.com/browse/X3-274423. The customers are displayed when there payments associated to them.

content_parts.title: Payment entry import: syntax error in '' status:abort : Illegal character

content_parts.content: Modification: other templates then "PAY" can now be used to import payments.

content_parts.title: Impossible to pass JE from Temporary to Final if [DAE]AMTVAT populated

content_parts.content: The useless blocking message on VATDAT field is removed.

content_parts.title: BSI: Unwanted automatic matching on existing Payments

content_parts.content: When nothing is ticked in the area "Payments" of the Bank import setting, then the Automatic matching not consider matching on existing payments at all.

content_parts.title: BSIIMPORT function /CAMT054 : CUR field is empty in BSIIMP

content_parts.content: Improved record update after currency check.

content_parts.title: Bank import setting (BSIIMPPAR) : error  "CDASHOPAY: Mandatory field"

content_parts.content: CDASHOPAY field is not more mandatory for standard flow type

content_parts.title: POR (LEG): SAF-T extraction error "PaymentPaymentRefNoCustomerIDConstraint"

content_parts.content: Solved on https://jira.sage.com/browse/X3-274423. The customers are displayed when there payments associated to them.

content_parts.title: Polish legislation: Errors in Bank register function (GESXDE): @X3.TRT/LIBWL$adx (333) Error 50: Function not defined for the value given mid$

content_parts.content: Symfonia WS kas.symfonia.pl provided new error when their process of update of the whitelist takes longer as expected. This new error is handled by X3 now.

content_parts.title: BSI  - errors on amounts paid in currency and in statement currency

content_parts.content: There have been done corrections of calculating values to handle different currencies.

content_parts.title: P-IMO32: Column 14 – the formula is not correct

content_parts.content: Report P-IMO32 in column 14 formula is corrected.

content_parts.title: Standard report BPCINVPRE is not homologated for Portuguese legislation

content_parts.content: The fields PTMENTION07 and @lbl_typfac are not both visible at the same time - therefore, no overlapping error happens.

content_parts.title: P-IMO33-12: Column 15 wrong title and calculation

content_parts.content: Calculation of column 15 is now correct.

content_parts.title: Error when generating the Annual VAT return (GESDVPHA)

content_parts.content: It is not possible to create two documents in accounting with the same sequence even if they are from different document types.

content_parts.title: For a final consumer(Natural person) of type "Normal" if field "EU VAT no (EECNUM)" empty, then tag CustomerTaxID should have the generic no 999999990 AND we should be able to insert the correct EECNUM (TIN) one even after issuing documents.

content_parts.content: Solved on https://jira.sage.com/browse/X3-274423. For a 'normal' type customer if the field is empty it is adding the generic VAT number.

content_parts.title: Manufacturing
Bug Fixes
Back-to-back order function FUNMAUTF is allowing the creation of a work order with back-to-back manual hold is set to Yes.

content_parts.content: In the function FUNMAUTF, when the user goes into View and selects OK to generate a WO, the user will now receive a log error that there is a manual hold, if one has been specified in the Sales order. In Enterprise planning and Planning workbench, the user will receive an error message if they try to run a plan / initiate for a sales order with a hold.

content_parts.title: The Alternate component is not considered and the UOM is wrongly changed in Replace component in mass.

content_parts.content:
Bug fixing required following small enhancement without changing the functional behavior:
1. Production links - New column BOM to display the existing BOM UOM of the replaced component. This column will have values marked in red if it is different from the STK UOM of the replaced component.
2. On click of the "OK" button, the user will be prompted with a message if the BOM UOM (existing -Replaced component) is different to the STK UOM of the alternate component from the production link for each of the lines. The message - Sequence: # / Parent product: ####. Do you want to use the existing BOMUOM (Yes) or switch the BOMUOM to the STKUOM (No)?
3. Option - Yes, the calculation of the quantities for the alternate component will be based on the previous (replaced component) BOM UOM.
4. Option - No, the calculation of the quantities for the alternate component will be based on the STK UOM. This is the existing functionality and is default.

content_parts.title: Configurator selection crash

content_parts.content: A selection with a secondary filter that uses symbols (S_ -fields) which then will be asked as questions when running the selection need the definition of an inital procedure / standard process with usage code "For selections". All the symbols used within the secondary filter must be defined here as active questions. The symbols entered here then can be used to generate the screen with all the needed fields like title T_, symbol S_ and description Z_. A further correction has only been done to keep all questions open (not greyed out) in order to be able to enter all the answers.

content_parts.title: WO can be closed even if a shop floor tracking transaction is not finished or validated

content_parts.content: When the user tries to close a WO with a shop floor tracking in progress or not validated, previously this would be allowed. Now, after this fix, the user will receive an error message "You cannot close work order [work order number]. Shop floor tracking is still in progress or your labor entry is awaiting validation." and the WO will remain open.

content_parts.title: PJM
Bug Fixes
Project copy from one site to another

content_parts.content: Updating the Sales site or the Operating site in the Project copy function was not updating automatically the site in the task list and budget list.

content_parts.title: Sales order created from an intersite flow in a Project management context

content_parts.content: A Sales order linked to a project and created from an intersite flow are currently tracked in the project financial overview. For customers expecting to exclude such Sales orders from the Financial overview function, 2 new SQL queries have been delivered (PJMRN02B and PJMRN04B). They can be used as a replacement for the standard SQL queries (PJMRN002 and PJMRN004) in the Financial overvew query setup function (GESPJQ).

content_parts.title: People
Improvements
Tax Changes 2022-2023

content_parts.content:
Legislation value updated

TAX_CREDIT

  • Valid from: 04/01/2022 (1st April 2022)
  • Tax credit = M10,560.00 annually / Tax credit = M880.00 monthly

Grid values updated

TAX_TABLE  -  04/01/22
TAX_TABLE2  -  04/01/22

content_parts.title: Platform
Bug Fixes
Error when changing the company name on all Spanish environments

content_parts.content: Modification of the control of siret for Spain.

content_parts.title: Action not possible when validating a import template, once you modified it

content_parts.content: Error action not possible has been corrected when clicking on Validate after a modification in import template .

content_parts.title: Error when creating a view with an ACB field

content_parts.content: a warning is displayed , to report that the clob/blob must be defined at the end. of the request.

content_parts.title: Zooming in (via browser) on a Landing Page's Process Map does not display scroll bars

content_parts.content: Scrollbars restored to allow access to entire visual process when page is zoomed.

content_parts.title: Statistical inquiry DATFIN2 incorrect in case of monthly statistic

content_parts.content: Fixed end date setting for monthly, quarterly and yearly periods

content_parts.title: Using Control table to Prohibited value for zero (0) does not work

content_parts.content: the Control Table function to restrict a field for the value 0 is corrected, specifically when using the prohibit value option within the control table record.

content_parts.title: The description on the graphical item changes after clicking on it
New Word Office addin: support of RICH TEXT

content_parts.content: Support of RTF field from Word addin is done

content_parts.title: Display of the default values when the Criteria button is clicked a second time in SQL querys

content_parts.content: The default values are displayed for the criteria button

content_parts.title: Outlook Synchronization: bad link for task
Error when purging documentation links Class nonexistent [M:DIA]

content_parts.content: Fix purging the documentation links function.

content_parts.title: Issue generated scripts in statistics validation

content_parts.content: script is now correctly generated if no record in PARSTALIG

content_parts.title: LDAPs - CA certificates of LDAP server for TLS

content_parts.content: Correction has been done. Certificat management for Ldap connection has been improved

content_parts.title: Error during Syracuse installation with 0 web services processes

content_parts.content: The value '0' is now authorized as number of web services processes while a blank field triggers an error message; which is correct.

content_parts.title: Line text / Header and Footer are not being display on the word Quote document

content_parts.content: The new Word addin will now support RTF value and will be able to display the value even if it was saved with a wrong RTF format

content_parts.title: PU9 to V12 Migration custom views ENAFLG = 0

content_parts.content: uti is launched for spe views in valdos

content_parts.title: CSV format Extraction with ‘=’ sign prefixed to the account number

content_parts.content: CSV format is aligned with AEXPXML process

content_parts.title: From 2021R3, problem "Format reserved for HTML exports" for XML Import Templates

content_parts.content: the date format control takes into account the file type

content_parts.title: Purchase request signature at the line level

content_parts.content: Fixed signing correct line by configured delegate.

content_parts.title: 'Where' additional parameter in queries not managed by Excel addin

content_parts.content: Correction done, the same parameters used to fetch the data of page are propagated to the url forwarded to the addin

content_parts.title: Export a vertical menu with the function "Export profiles"

content_parts.content: Improvment has been done to support export for submodule

content_parts.title: Update Log4j

content_parts.content: LOG4J has been updated to version Log4J 2.15.

content_parts.title: The Syracuse service user is limited to 32 characters

content_parts.content:
We now authorize 127 characters for login and passwords.
Reason: Linux has other rules and even Windows can use a long domain name.

content_parts.title: GIMPOBJ with ADI (Miscellaneous tables) template allows creating records without the mandatory CODE field

content_parts.content: in AOE ADI take into account the mandatory CODE

content_parts.title: Query tool: Restriction on CCE type field does not work

content_parts.content: Add the declaration of the object table when it used in the link instruction of the request. This is necessary for object with access code defined.

content_parts.title: Warehousing
Features
X3 Warehousing - View the content of a Serial Group

content_parts.content: This new function "Serial group" (in menu Common data/Products) allow to manage serial groups used in localized serial number functionality. Please note that this function display also the content of a serial group.

content_parts.title: Bug Fixes
[Waves] Infinite Loop when launching a wave

content_parts.content: Optimise the control Replenishment of necessity.

content_parts.title: Addressing issue with proximity picking functionality

content_parts.content: Addressing in proximity picking works properly when both "Single Container" and "Container Correspondance" options are checked on location.

content_parts.title: GEODE Crash in VTTRF transfer RF procedure: [M:TRM] Class non-existent

content_parts.content: The validation transfert RF function (VTTRF) generate proper functional error message when validating partial transfer on store setup with "transfer complet object".

content_parts.title: Assembly - Transfer of finished product stock in picking not allowed

content_parts.content:
Today the assembly "transfer in stock" function (TRMKIT) follow the current behaviour in stock domain. Meaning that we have separated functions to perform unitary transfers and replenishments.
So be able to manage replenishment in this function (TRMKIT) is an improvement to be planned for a future release.
Anyway, the user is not stuck as he can use the standard replenishment function to replenish its picking location from the kit located in the assembly store.
